snippet: Two Romanians were suspected of trying to steal the card numbers and PINs of customers at a Chase branch on the northern edge of Park Slope.
abstract: Two Romanians nationals, Laurentiu Baies and Marcel Boariu, are arrested and charged with trying to steal card numbers and PINs of customers at Chase branch on northern edge of Park Slope, Brooklyn; pair are charged with burglary and criminal possession of forgery device.
lead_paragraph: Two Romanians were suspected of trying to steal the card numbers and PINs of customers at a Chase branch on the northern edge of Park Slope.

headline.main: Two Arrested at Brooklyn Bank With A.T.M. Fraud Device
headline.print_headline: 2 Arrested at Brooklyn Bank With A.T.M. Fraud Device
